description.brief: Electrical damage that can chain between enemies and provides burst damage with stunning effects.
description.detailed: Lightning damage represents the power of connection and sudden revelation. It excels at hitting multiple targets through chaining effects and can provide powerful burst damage with stunning capabilities. Lightning damage often has the highest single-hit potential but can be unpredictable in its targeting.
description.visual_effects: Brilliant white and blue electrical arcs with thunder sounds, crackling energy, and chain lightning effects
description.lore_explanation: Lightning damage channels the ancient power of Voltharion, the Cosmic Spark - the fundamental force that connects all things and existed before creation itself. This primal electricity flows through Yggdrasil's branches, enabling communication between the Nine Realms.

status_effects.description: Increases damage taken by 8% per stack, up to 40%
Next lightning damage deals double damage

special_mechanics.name: Chain Lightning
special_mechanics.description: Lightning damage can jump to nearby enemies, with 75% damage per jump

special_mechanics.name: Electrical Overload
special_mechanics.description: High lightning damage can cause area explosions

special_mechanics.name: Spark Generation
special_mechanics.description: Lightning kills generate sparks that provide temporary damage bonuses

vs_fire.effect: Lightning ignites burning effects, causing immediate explosion damage

vs_cold.effect: Lightning deals +50% damage to frozen targets and can shatter them

vs_water.effect: Lightning damage spreads through wet areas and water

with_stats.lightning_mastery: Direct multiplier and chain efficiency bonus

lore_details.fundamental_connection: Draws directly from Voltharion, the Cosmic Spark, one of the three Fundamental Gods
lore_details.yggdrasil_manifestation: Flows through the electrical currents in Yggdrasil's branches that connect the Nine Realms
lore_details.cosmic_role: Represents the force that enables communication, inspiration, and sudden revelation
lore_details.ancient_nature: Predates the World Tree itself, serving as the original connecting force between all things
lore_details.divine_communication: Lightning practitioners sometimes receive brief flashes of divine insight during powerful castings

divine_trio_dynamics.trio_interactions: Lightning connects what Fire would separate through transformation, Cold would isolate through preservation. Fire's heat conducts through Lightning's energy, Lightning sparks Cold's crystalline networks, Cold grounds what Lightning would scatter. The fundamental trinity of connection, transformation, and preservation.
divine_trio_dynamics.cross_trio_relationship: Fundamental forces flow through and empower Primal manifestations. Lightning's connections amplify Physical prowess, disrupt Chaos's randomness through ordered energy flow, and provide the divine spark that Radiance channels into protective light.

interaction_explanation.strong_against: Physical and Fire - Lightning overwhelms physical defenses with speed and energizes flame into plasma
interaction_explanation.weak_against: Chaos and Cold - Chaotic energy disrupts electrical patterns, cold crystallization grounds and dissipates energy
interaction_explanation.neutral_with: Lightning (self-mastery) and Radiance - Pure energy mastery, balanced opposition with divine illumination
